Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to banned members of social referral services
Summary: Allows social referral services to retain records of banned members for up to six years from expiration of the purchase contract or services rendered; requires online dating services to disclose certain information to New York members who previously interacted with banned members subject to a fraud ban.
LawCode: Amd ยง394-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to banned members of social referral services
